Vamsee Kanakala wrote:

> Absolutely! And I'm amazed at how many design mistakes I find while
> unit-testing. You're trying to test something, it feels unintuitive, and
> ka-boom! You know what's wrong. JUnit rocks!

For every one of you, there are a hundred others who see this as a 
limitation of JUnit. Shame.
